name: Furniture_of_America_Aurese_Chenille_Reclining_Sofa
reviews: This is a good quality and well-built couch. It will deserve 5 stars if the lower-back fabric flap is lengthened by just one inch to better attach to the lower frame's Velcro strip. Meantime, attaching a Velcro extension is a simple solution. I would buy this couch again, even with that issue.

Very disappointed. There are visible gaps between each reclining section and the center piece that does not recline sticks out further than the side sections. It stated not to sit on the arms of the sofa and I can see why. It appears to be very poorly made. I purchased the matching loveseat and the gap between the two section on it were even bigger. The only positive comment is that part of the reason that I ordered this sofa was because of the color and the grey color is very nice. Aside from that for almost $* each I don't believe that they are going to last very long.

We really like the Furniture of America Aurese Chenille Reclining Sofa. The price was right, the set up was easy, although it helps to have two people. Its comfy; just what we wantedThe delivery was right into our living room.
description:
Convince the entire family to join in for movie night with this comfortable reclining sofa. The soft chenille upholstery doubles the comfort factor, while the pop-out foot rests on both end seats are built for lazy afternoon naps. Rounded edges give this sofa a truly relaxed look that fits both the living room and den.
Set includes: One (1) sofaMaterials: Solid wood, foam and fabricUpholstery color options: Brown or greyUpholstery fabric: ChenilleUpholstery fill: FoamPlushly filled sofa design offers comfort and styleEach end seat offers a reclining function for added convenienceOversized arms accentuate the bucket seat design and rolled back cushionsSmooth chenille fabric available in two (2) classic color optionsMatching recliner chair and loveseat sold separatelyAll dimensions are approximateSeat dimensions: 19 inches high x 20.5 inches deepOverall dimensions: 38.88 inches high x 77.13 inches wide x 38.13 inches deepStyleContemporary, Modern, TransitionalMaterialFabric, Foam, WoodTypeSofaAssemblyAssembly RequiredColorBrown, GreyFurniture PatternSolid
